headline: 3 Brilliant Growth Stocks to Buy Now and Hold Forever
summary: This tech titan has multiple growth avenues to reward investors over the long term.  This footwear stock has an impressive track record of delivering growth and beating expectations.  This e-commerce leader has multiple growth drivers and loads of opportunity.

headline: Deckers Outdoor: Buying Here Could Be A Mistake (Technical Analysis)
summary: Deckers Outdoor Corporation shows bullish technicals but weak fundamentals, with declining Q4 guidance and overvaluation risks. Learn why DECK stock is a sell.
